content: here is an adorable sweater pattern for keeping your teddy bear warm this winter worked in one size to fit a medium sized teddy 15 **materials ** this is a great way to use up all of those lovely yarn leftovers that you can t bear to throw away try this in self-striping yarns or create your own striping pattern by using up your left over bits of yarn **skill level ** intermediate **stitches ** * fpdc * bpdc * single_crochet pattern has not been tested if you find any errors please contact me
